name: Lagunas de Montebello
description:
Introduction

Beautiful lagoons in the middle of the forest. Their main characteristic is that each lagoon has a distinctive color/shade ranging from green, blue to red. Their temperature is very comfortable all year round. A small kayaking paradise.
